newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: SAfrica's JSE sets new trading value all-time high.
newsitem.headline: SAfrica's JSE sets new trading value all-time high.

text.p: South Africa's Johannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE) said on Friday that the past trading week had seen an all-time high value of shares traded.
The JSE said that 3.282 billion rand worth of shares had been traded in the week ending November 15, beating the previous record of 3.126 billion rand in the week ended November 1.
